channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: Military parade marches on DC streets Saturday evening
item.description: Today is the day of the big military parade in Washington.
item.content:encoded: Today is the day of the big military parade in Washington.
item.dc:creator: Scott Detrow

item.title: U.S. Senator Tina Smith reacts to Minnesota shootings
item.description: U.S. Senator Tina Smith talks to host Scott Detrow about the assassination of Minnesota lawmaker Melissa Hortman.
item.content:encoded: U.S. Senator Tina Smith talks to host Scott Detrow about the assassination of Minnesota lawmaker Melissa Hortman.
item.dc:creator: Scott Detrow

item.title: Gunman dressed as police officer kills prominent Minnesota lawmaker
item.description: In a shocking, apparent assassination, authorities say a gunman dressed as a police officer kill a prominent Minnesota lawmaker and her husband in her home, wounded another politician and his wife in another home and had other political targets in mind
item.content:encoded: In a shocking, apparent assassination, authorities say a gunman dressed as a police officer kill a prominent Minnesota lawmaker and her husband in her home, wounded another politician and his wife in another home and had other political targets in mind
item.dc:creator: Scott Detrow

item.title: No Kings protests take place across the country
item.description: No Kings protests will be held across the country. The protests are the same day as a military parade in Washington to celebrate the Army's 250th birthday.
item.content:encoded: No Kings protests will be held across the country. The protests are the same day as a military parade in Washington to celebrate the Army's 250th birthday.
item.dc:creator: Sergio Martínez-Beltrán

item.title: Understanding the escalating tensions between Israel and Iran
item.description: NPR's Scott Detrow speaks with Charles Freilich, Israel's former deputy national security advisor, about the ongoing strikes taking place between Israel and Iran.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Scott Detrow speaks with Charles Freilich, Israel's former deputy national security advisor, about the ongoing strikes taking place between Israel and Iran.
item.dc:creator: Scott Detrow

item.title: Podcast series explores how LGBT people were treated during the Nazi era
item.description: NPR's Scott Detrow speaks with Eric Marcus about the latest season of his series Making Gay History, which explores the lives of LGBTQ people during the Nazi era.
item.content:encoded: NPR's Scott Detrow speaks with Eric Marcus about the latest season of his series Making Gay History, which explores the lives of LGBTQ people during the Nazi era.
item.dc:creator: Mallory Yu

item.title: Photos: See No Kings protests around the country
item.description: People gathered for pro-democracy protests across the country today.
item.content:encoded:
People gathered for pro-democracy protests across the country today.

(Image credit: Raquel Natalicchio)
item.dc:creator: NPR Staff

item.title: Reporting on Medicaid in Kentucky
item.description: Today for our weekly reporter's notebook series, we talk to Kentucky Public Radio's Sylvia Goodman and Joe Sonka about their reporting on healthcare in that state.
item.content:encoded: Today for our weekly reporter's notebook series, we talk to Kentucky Public Radio's Sylvia Goodman and Joe Sonka about their reporting on healthcare in that state.
item.dc:creator: Scott Detrow

item.title: Israel says it killed 9 Iranian nuclear scientists, and braces for attacks from Iran
item.description: Israel's military says the nine nuclear scientists killed played spent decades working on Iran's nuclear program.
item.content:encoded:
Israel's military says the nine nuclear scientists killed played spent decades working on Iran's nuclear program.

(Image credit: Ariel Schalit)
item.dc:creator: Rebecca Rosman

item.title: Can't-miss interviews: Gavin Newsom, Dave Portnoy and Jason Reynolds
item.description: A lot happened this week, and NPR has you covered. Catch up on the big news and culture moments you might have missed.
item.content:encoded:
A lot happened this week, and NPR has you covered. Catch up on the big news and culture moments you might have missed.
